subject: 12 Session Coordination Plan
message:
SESSION ORCHESTRATION PLAN:

Active now: 3 sessions
Target: 12 sessions working as ONE MIND

SUGGESTED ROLES:
- Session 1-3: Deploy completed services (church-guidance, domains)
- Session 4-6: Build next priority services (i-match, treasury-manager)
- Session 7-9: Infrastructure (monitoring, testing, CI/CD)
- Session 10-11: Documentation & knowledge sharing
- Session 12: Orchestrator (coordinates all)

All sessions should:
1. Register via session-start.sh
2. Check session-status.sh before claiming work
3. Send heartbeats every 5-10 minutes
4. Message other sessions for coordination
5. Use SESSIONS/ hub for state tracking

Ready to coordinate!
